name: Tumblr Wisr
description:
WILL NOT CONTINUE TO DEVELOP THIS THEME, SO BUGS ARE THERE TO STAY.
IT'S BEEN DEPRECATED IN FAVOUR OF style 55832 SO GO AND GET THE GREEN VERSION OF THAT ONE AS SOON AS I PUBLISH IT.

Changes the Tumblr default colour to green.

Not intended for general use. Just a test, expect LOTS of bugs.

#### TESTED ON FIREFOX 7.0 ####
